alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 12:12AM EDT until March 27 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Spalding County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Morgan County in north central Georgia... Butts County in central Georgia... Jasper County in central Georgia... Southeastern Newton County in north central Georgia... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1212 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Starrsville to near McKibben, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Madison, Monticello, Rutledge, Newborn, Flovilla, Mansfield, Jenkinsburg, Shady Dale, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Worthville, McKibben, Starrsville, Brick Store, Calvin, Farrar, Eudora, North Alcovy and McElheneys Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
